history.proof: qsimpl time: 1. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_lim_LimInf_seq. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_lim_LimInf_seq,is_LimInf_seq_unique. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_lim_LimInf_seq,is_LimInf_seq_unique,is_lim_LimSup_seq. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_lim_LimInf_seq,is_LimInf_seq_unique,is_LimSup_seq_unique,is_lim_LimSup_seq. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_lim_LimInf_seq,is_LimInf_seq_unique,is_LimSup_seq_unique,is_lim_LimSup_seq.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of H (LimSup_seq u) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment u : nat -> R H : LimSup_seq u = LimInf_seq u Unable to unify "match ?M2494 with | Finite l => forall eps : posreal, (forall N : nat, exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\\ ?M2493 n < l + eps) /\\ (exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> l - eps < ?M2493 n) | p_infty => forall M : R, exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> M < ?M2493 n | m_infty => forall (M : R) (N : nat), exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\\ ?M2493 n < M end" with "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally (LimInf_seq u) P -> filtermap u eventually P".
Unable to find an instance for the variables u, l.
The reference H0 was not found in the current environment.

In environment H2 : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_LimInf_seq u l -> LimInf_seq u = l H1 : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_lim_seq u l -> is_LimInf_seq u l u : nat -> R H : LimSup_seq u = LimInf_seq u Unable to unify "match ?M2972 with | Finite l => forall eps : posreal, (forall N : nat, exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\\ l - eps < ?M2971 n) /\\ (exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> ?M2971 n < l + eps) | p_infty => forall (M : R) (N : nat), exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\\ M < ?M2971 n | m_infty => forall M : R, exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> ?M2971 n < M end" with "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally (Sup_seq (fun m : nat => Inf_seq (fun n : nat => u (n + m)%nat))) P -> filtermap u eventually P".
Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_LimSup_seq u l -> LimSup_seq u = l" on hypothesis of type "LimSup_seq u = LimInf_seq u".
The LHS of H (LimSup_seq u) does not match any subterm of the goal

original: intros H H0. apply is_LimSup_seq_unique in H. apply is_LimInf_seq_unique in H0. rewrite <- H0 in H. rewrite H. apply is_lim_LimInf_seq. apply is_LimInf_seq_unique in H0. rewrite H0. apply is_lim_LimSup_seq. apply is_LimSup_seq_unique in H. rewrite H.
